::Galactors/Autofire::

The Slasys/Supernova/Scrap jet flies up, the slash passing in front of
it but not harming it. Two missiles explode against its rear, sending
it flipping through the air till it regains stability and scans behind
itself.

An identified object was right on its tail, firing madly. The object
was an enlongated spheare, with engines on the back and weapons all
over.

"Get this gun off me!" Supernova says over the comm to the Vicyr/Flare
jet. The cloaked jet recieves the orders and flies up behind the
sphere, firing two missiles.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Autofire swirls in the air, easily avoiding the two missiles. His
scanners get to work on locating the cloaked jet behind him.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dcoburn" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> ::Composer/Surgital::
> 
>     Composer does a few acrobatic moves in the air and dodges both
of the lazer shots from Autofire.  Composer looked at the gestalt.  He
fired 2 plasma shots at Surgital's forehead.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>     Surgital quickly sees the missiles and charges from the Galactor
jets coming at him, and puts the arm that is Explobody in front of him
to block, as Explobody was the most durable Bodicon.  Surgital's arm
takes the damage, and takes it pretty badly, but is still intact and
functional.  Then, out of nowhere, Surgital is hit dead on in the
forehead by plasma shots, and stumbles back, then his gigantic body
falls backwards down on the CF.
> 
>     "YOUCH!" Surgital yelped in pain, pulling his body back up onto
its feet and vigorously rubbing his back.
> 
>     "Decepticons, I say we work on their shields!  But first,
revenge!" Surgital's voice boomed over the battlefield.
> 
>     Surgital lifted up the leg that was Legtrap, then bent it so his
knee was "aiming" at Composer.  Then, his knee plate opened up and
fired out a big, energon net at Composer.  He then stomped his foot
back on the ground.  Surgital's hand converted into a spinning saw
blade again and he turned around and attempted to cut one or both of
the Galactor jets.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>      Composer got caught in the massive net.  When it wrapped around
his body, it brought him down to the ground like a rock.  He struggled
to get out.  The net was made of energon, and everytime he touched it
he was being exposed to high levels of energon which was over the
safety limit.
> 
>      "Wheeljack!  Somebody!  Gemme outta here!" Composer cried for
help.
